titleStmt.title: The verity of Christian faith written by Hierome Savanorola [sic] of Ferrara.
Triumphus crucis Liber 2. English
titleStmt.author: Savonarola, Girolamo, 1452-1498.

titleStmt.title: The verity of Christian faith written by Hierome Savanorola [sic] of Ferrara.
Triumphus crucis Liber 2. English
titleStmt.author: Savonarola, Girolamo, 1452-1498.

notesStmt.note: A translation of the second book of Savonarola's "Triumphus crucis".
Added t.p. on prelim. p. [5] of copy at reel 649:7 reads: The triumph of the crosse, or, Of the verity of faith.
This item appears as part of "Five treatises" at reel 649:7, and issued and filmed separately at reel 1239:8.
Reproduction of originals in University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library and Cambridge University Library.
